charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, and attempt to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, a Scheduled II Controlled Substance) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 240 months imprisonment; 10 years supervised release; $5,000.00 fine; $50.00 special assessment. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (Attempt to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance; Aiding and Abetting) (2)
The Defendants unlawfully, knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute cocaine in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) [5:95-m-502]

21:846=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, and attempt to possess with intent to distribute cocaine, a Scheduled II Controlled Substance) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 37 months imprisonment; 5 years supervised release; $1, 000.00 fine; and $100.00 special assessment (1)
